orb:
#ifdef GL_ES
precision highp float;
#endif
uniform float time;uniform vec2 resolution;
#define iTime time
#define iResolution resolution
#define t iTime
#define SAMPLES 10
#define FOCAL_DISTANCE 4.
#define FOCAL_RANGE 6.
mat2 m(float a){float c=cos(a),s=sin(a);return mat2(c,-s,s,c);}float map(vec3 p){p.xz*=m(t*.4);p.xy*=m(t*.3);vec3 q=p*2.+t;return length(p+vec3(sin(t*.7)))*log(length(p)+1.)+sin(q.x+sin(q.z+sin(q.y)))*.5-1.;}vec3 hslToRgb(vec3 hsl){vec3 rgb=clamp(abs(mod(hsl.x*6.+vec3(.0,4.,2.),6.)-3.)-1.,.0,1.);return hsl.z+hsl.y*(rgb-.5)*(1.-abs(2.*hsl.z-1.));}vec3 getColor(in vec2 fragCoord,in float depth){vec2 p=fragCoord.xy/iResolution.y-vec2(.9,.5);vec3 cl=vec3(0.);float d=depth;for(int i=0;i<=5;i++){vec3 p=vec3(0,0,5.)+normalize(vec3(p,-1.))*d;float rz=map(p);float f=clamp((rz-map(p+.1))*.5,-.1,1.);float hue=mod(t*1.+float(i)/5.,1.);float hueRange=.1;float hueShift=.5;hue=mix(.0,1.,smoothstep(.0,hueRange,hue))+hueShift;vec3 color=hslToRgb(vec3(hue,.0,.5));vec3 l=color+vec3(5.,2.5,3.)*f;cl=cl*l+smoothstep(2.5,.0,rz)*.7*l;d+=min(rz,1.);}return cl;}void mainImage(out vec4 fragColor,in vec2 fragCoord){vec3 color=vec3(.0);float depthSum=.0;for(int i=0;i<SAMPLES;i++){float depth=FOCAL_DISTANCE+(float(i)/float(SAMPLES-1))*FOCAL_RANGE;vec3 sampleColor=getColor(fragCoord,depth);float weight=1./(1.+abs(depth-FOCAL_DISTANCE));color+=sampleColor*weight;depthSum+=weight;}color/=depthSum;fragColor=vec4(color,1.);}void main(void){mainImage(gl_FragColor,gl_FragCoord.xy);}
